translations: adj.累赘的，成负担的；讨厌的

phrs.translation: 讨厌的, 笨重的, 成负担的, 累赘的
累赘的, 麻烦的, 拖累的

sentences.sentence: These structures are conspicuous from their ugliness; no grace or beauty is suggested. They consist of cumbrous stone slabs and pillars, set up in the stiffest manner possible.
sentences.translation: 这些牌坊因结构难看而显眼，没有任何优雅和美感可言。牌坊由块垒不平的石板和石柱构成，僵直地立在那里。
